pkgmetadata.longdescription: Streams are iterables with a pipelining mechanism to enable data-flowprogramming and easy parallelization.See the reference documentation at <http://www.trinhhaianh.com/stream.py>.Articles written by the author about the module can be viewed at <http://blog.onideas.ws/tag/project:stream.py>.The code repository is located at <http://github.com/aht/stream.py>.
